title: Chocolate Christmas Yule log
ingredients: ['For the cake', '90g (3 oz) caster sugar', '2 large eggs', '90g (3 oz) self-raising flour', '1 heaped tablespoon cocoa powder', 'For the filling', '3 tablespoons boiling water', '30g (1 oz) butter', '1/2 to 1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '140g (5 oz) icing sugar', 'For the outer icing', '60g (2 oz) butter', '1 tablespoon cocoa powder', '255g (9 oz) icing sugar']
